name: TRON Lightcycle Power Run
theme: Race on a lightcycle through the Grid in this high-speed launched coaster with a digital canopy.
short_description: A thrilling launched motorcycle coaster through the world of TRON.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Battle for the Sunken Treasure
theme: Join Captain Jack Sparrow on a cutting-edge boat adventure featuring projection mapping and animatronics.
short_description: A revolutionary boat ride combining physical sets with seamless digital effects.

name: Roaring Rapids
theme: Navigate wild rapids through ancient ruins encountering a massive crocodileâ€”you will get soaked!
short_description: A thrilling whitewater raft ride through Adventure Isle.

name: Soaring Over the Horizon
theme: Glide over iconic landmarks and natural wonders from around the world in this breathtaking flight.
short_description: A hang gliding simulator soaring over global landmarks.

name: Camp Discovery Challenge Trails
theme: Explore rope bridges, climbing challenges, and caves in this interactive adventure playground.
short_description: A walk-through adventure with rope courses and exploration trails.

name: Seven Dwarfs Mine Train
theme: Swing through the diamond mine on a family coaster featuring swaying mine cars and Snow White scenes.
short_description: A swinging family coaster through the Seven Dwarfs' mine.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
theme: Fly over London and Neverland in suspended pirate ships with enhanced special effects.
short_description: A flying dark ride through Peter Pan's adventures with modern enhancements.

name: Voyage to the Crystal Grotto
theme: Cruise through a magical grotto beneath the Enchanted Storybook Castle with glowing crystals and projections.
short_description: A peaceful boat journey through a mystical cavern beneath the castle.

name: Frozen: A Sing-Along Celebration
theme: Join Anna and Elsa for an interactive sing-along celebration of Frozen's iconic songs.
short_description: An audience-participation show featuring Frozen characters and songs.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
theme: Journey through the Hundred Acre Wood with Pooh and friends in honey pots.
short_description: A gentle dark ride through Winnie the Pooh's storybook adventures.

name: Alice in Wonderland Maze
theme: Navigate through a whimsical hedge maze with scenes from Alice in Wonderland.
short_description: An interactive maze with Alice in Wonderland characters and surprises.

name: Fantasia Carousel
theme: A magical carousel featuring fantastical creatures from Disney's Fantasia.
short_description: An ornate carousel with characters inspired by Fantasia.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
theme: Soar on flying elephants with control over your flight height.
short_description: A classic flying elephant spinner for all ages.

name: Buzz Lightyear Planet Rescue
theme: Help Buzz Lightyear defeat Emperor Zurg by shooting targets with laser blasters.
short_description: An interactive shooting dark ride with competitive scoring.

name: Jet Packs
theme: Fly in futuristic jet packs controlling your altitude as you orbit.
short_description: A spinning rocket ride with guest-controlled height.

name: Stitch Encounter
theme: Have a live conversation with mischievous alien Stitch via satellite transmission.
short_description: An interactive show where guests chat with Stitch in real-time.

name: Rex's Racer
theme: Swing back and forth on Rex's prehistoric tail in this thrilling pendulum ride.
short_description: A swinging ship ride themed to Rex from Toy Story.

name: Slinky Dog Spin
theme: Spin around as Slinky Dog chases his tail in Andy's backyard.
short_description: A spinning flat ride featuring Slinky Dog.

name: Woody's Round-Up
theme: Ride Bullseye the horse in a spinning Wild West roundup.
short_description: A spinning ride with horses themed to Woody's Roundup.

name: Marvel Universe
theme: Meet Marvel superheroes including Iron Man, Captain America, Spider-Man, and more.
short_description: An interactive character experience with Marvel heroes.

name: Garden of the Twelve Friends
theme: Explore a garden featuring Disney characters representing the Chinese zodiac animals.
short_description: A walk-through garden celebrating Disney characters and Chinese zodiac.

name: Golden Fairytale Fanfare
theme: A daytime castle stage show featuring Disney characters, acrobatics, and music.
short_description: A spectacular stage show on the Enchanted Storybook Castle forecourt.

name: Tarzan: Call of the Jungle
theme: A live acrobatic show celebrating Tarzan with stunning aerial performances and jungle drumming.
short_description: An athletic stage show featuring Tarzan with acrobatics and stunts.

name: Eye of the Storm: Captain Jack's Stunt Spectacular
theme: Watch Captain Jack Sparrow and crew perform swashbuckling stunts, sword fights, and pirate action.
short_description: A live-action pirate stunt show featuring Captain Jack Sparrow.

name: Explorer Canoes
theme: Paddle a real canoe around the waterways of Treasure Cove with fellow guests.
short_description: A free-floating canoe experience where guests actually paddle.

name: Shipwreck Shore
theme: An interactive pirate-themed play area with shipwrecks to explore and water features.
short_description: A playground for children themed to pirate adventures.

name: Once Upon a Time Adventure
theme: Walk through the Enchanted Storybook Castle discovering Disney princess stories in magical galleries.
short_description: A walk-through attraction inside the castle featuring Disney princesses.

name: Mickey's Storybook Express
theme: A whimsical daytime parade featuring Disney characters on train-themed floats.
short_description: The park's signature daytime parade with elaborate floats.

name: Ignite the Dream: A Nighttime Spectacular
theme: A breathtaking nighttime show with fireworks, projections, lasers, and fountains on the castle.
short_description: Shanghai Disneyland's premier nighttime spectacular over Enchanted Storybook Castle.

name: Zootopia: Hot Pursuit
theme: Join Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde on a thrilling trackless chase through Zootopia to catch criminals.
short_description: A state-of-the-art trackless dark ride through the world of Zootopia.
